# WebPeel Documentation

WebPeel is an open-source web scraping and data extraction tool. It converts any webpage into clean, AI-ready Markdown, supports browser rendering for JavaScript-heavy sites, and offers web search, crawling, batch fetching, and an MCP server for AI assistants.

## Getting Started
https://webpeel.dev/docs/getting-started

## CLI Reference
https://webpeel.dev/docs/cli

## API Reference
https://webpeel.dev/docs/api-reference

## MCP Server
https://webpeel.dev/docs/mcp

## SDKs & Integrations
https://webpeel.dev/docs/sdks

## Self-Hosting
https://webpeel.dev/docs/self-hosting

## Changelog
https://webpeel.dev/changelog
